headline: Top Funds Have Designs On This Nvidia-Powered Long-Term Leader
summary: Joining Microsoft and ServiceNow on the IBD Long-Term Leaders list, Cadence Design Systems taps AI and Nvidia tech to target a breakout.

headline: ServiceNow (NOW) Up 8.2% Since Last Earnings Report: Can It Continue?

headline: Was Jim Cramer Right About ServiceNow Inc. (NOW)?
summary: We recently published a list of 12 Stocks Jim Cramer Was Right About. In this article, we are going to take a look at where ServiceNow Inc. (NYSE:NOW) stands against other stocks that Jim Cramer discusses. Back in 2024, on May 15, a retired investor asked Cramer if he should add to his small position […]
